SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTN_LOGIN_SCRIN_IMAGE WHERE 1=1
AND IMAGE_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
SELECT IMAGE_ID , IMAGE_NM , IMAGE , IMAGE_FILE , IMAGE_DC , REFLCT_AT , FRST_REGISTER_ID AS "userId" , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "regDate" FROM COMTN_LOGIN_SCRIN_IMAGE WHERE IMAGE_ID = #{imageId}
SELECT IMAGE_FILE AS "imageFile" FROM COMTN_LOGIN_SCRIN_IMAGE WHERE REFLCT_AT = 'Y'
SELECT B.FILE_STRE_COURS AS "fileStreCours" , B.STRE_FILE_NM AS "streFileNm" FROM COMTN_LOGIN_SCRIN_IMAGE A INNER JOIN COMTN_FILE_DETAIL B ON A.IMAGE_FILE = B.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE IMAGE_ID = #{imageId}
